properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 3 at 1:09PM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM TO IMPACT THE REGION BEGINNING TUESDAY AFTERNOON
THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY EVENING...

.A storm system will move into the region Tuesday afternoon.
Abundant moisture will result in heavy amounts of snow for the
mountains and high valleys before snow levels rise and
precipitation changes to rain.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7
inches possible.

* WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley.

* WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
